title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Cartman's hosue, living room, day. Cartman, Stan, and Kyle are on the sofa laughing as Cartman does some prank calls

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Shu- shut up you gurs, shut up you guys.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Herro, Shitty Wok, take your order prease.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hello, is this City Wok?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yes, this Shitty Wok.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Uh, yes, we'd like one order of the City Beef.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Shitty Beef...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Aha, and I'll have the City Chicken.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Shitty Chicken...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh, dude, look!  It's that commercial with the guy that lost 400 pounds eating at Subway Sandwiches!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Commercial. The first thing on the screen is a submarine sandwich. It pans across the screen.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: He's still lookin' good!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: a man appears eating a footlong subway sandwich. The name "JARED VOGLE" appears on the screen near the bottom

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: he struts down a sidewalk. "LOST 262 LBS." appears on the screen

title: JARED HAS AIDES
role: His name is Jared and he likes to eat the sandwiches...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: a side shot of Jared walking smoothly behind a white picket fence in Downtown, then of slices of a party sub, then of the first sandwich

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Cartman living room. Butters walks in

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Uh hey, fellas.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hey Kenny

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Now gosh darnit, my name's not Kenny! Kenny's dead, and you're all gonna have to learn to deal with it!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Okay, Not-Kenny.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Commercial continues

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hey South Park!  You can meet Jared IN PERSON March 6th at the Kenny McCormick Memorial Town Square!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Woh, boy! Jared's comin' to town!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Dude! That's today!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: We've gotta get down there! Come on, Not-Kenny!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Now gosh darnit, my name's not Not-Kenny!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Okay, come on, Not-Not-Kenny.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wo-ah I'm getting steamed now.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hello! City Wok! City Wok I take your order prease!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Kenny McCormick Memorial Town Square, moments later. A crowd is in front of the stage waiting for Jared, with people holding up signs saying "We Love Jared" "We Love You Jared!!" "Jared for President", etc. The boys walk up to Mr. Garrison. Kyle taps him.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Excuse me. Could we get through here?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hell no! I've been savin' this spot for six hours!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
role: His name is Garrison, Mr. Garrison. He lost ten pounds takin'
text: Jared's lead-

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Here he comes!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: He's still lookin' good, with all those... sub sandwiches...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Thank you all so much. You know what? After a year of eating delicious sub sandwiches, I've proven weight loss is easy!  And I promise you, I will always be your faithful leader in easy weight loss!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Alright!!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That guy ate all the sandwiches he wanted and lost weight. He is sooo cool.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: South Park, later. A knock is heard and a door opens. Jared is seen eating a sub at a desk. A worker peaks in

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Mr. Vogle, some fans wanted to see if you'd sign their sandwich?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Sure, let 'em in.  Hi kids.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wow, Jared!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Dude! Did you really lose all that weight eating nothing but sub sandwiches?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I sure did! And- Well- Well I, I also had a little help on the side.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: What kind of help?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well, eating sub sandwiches was a big part of it. But the way that I lost so much weight was that I got aides.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Eh, AIDS?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That's right. I got aides about two years ago and I've been losing weight ever since. It's amazing how slim you can get with aides.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I'll bet you can.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Would you like to meet them?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Them?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: My aides. Scott, Tyler!  Scott is my personal trainer  and Tyler is my dietician.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hello.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh, "a i d E s" aides.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yep. Hooray for aides!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well, that's not really what you say in the commercial.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I know. You kinda have to read the fine print at the bottom of the screen. It says I only ate a half-sized lean turkey sandwich with no mustard or mayo or anything like that and then had proper diet and exercise aides.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: But you're lying to people. If they knew that you didn't eat just all the sandwiches you want, you might not be so popular.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: You, you think so. Well, why... should it matter?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: It matters, dude.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hmmm.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Main Street, moments later. The boys walk along...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That penisbutt didn't lose weight eating sub sandwiches. He lost weight because he ate less of them and exercised.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yeah, it's only in America that somebody can become famous just because they go from being a big fatass to not being a big fatass.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Ohmigod!  You guys! I think I'm having a genius moment. Yes. Yes! Its coming to me now.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That that's diarrhea.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Noo. Don't you see what this all means? Anybody could do what he did. What's to stop someone else from going to say, City Wok, and cutting a deal with them? Say they'll eat nothing but their Chinese food, but then eat only a little tiny bit of it and exercise.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Then City Wok could say their food makes them lose weight.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That's right Stan.  It's a cash cow I tell you.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That's a great idea!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Lose weight and make money. I tell you this is gonna be the greatest thing that Butters has ever done.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Meee???

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Weh- who do you think I'm talkin' about, Butters? Joyce de Witt?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh, no, I thought you meant you. Eh you're the fat one.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I can't lose weight, Butters, 'cause I'm not fat. I'm big-boned. You can't slim down bones, stupid!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: But Butters isn't fat.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That's my whole point. First we fatten him up, then we make the deal with City Wok, then take the weight back off.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: He's right. If Butters is naturally skinny, he'll be able to take the weight off faster.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Buut fellas, if I get fat my parents will ground me.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh come on! Just think about how famous you'll be!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: You mean like Jared?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yeah dude! You'll be just like Jared!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well the heck with that! You said Jared was a penisbutt!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: You wouldn't be a penisbutt, Butters, you'd be famous. Just think about all those people following you around, singing songs to you just because you lost some weight...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
role: His name is Butters, it's Butters. [the boys begin to sway for
text: each line]

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: He used to be fat but not no more

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: City Wok brought him down to a size 4.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Now he's got lots of moneys and girls

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: and a lifetime of free food at City Wok.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wow

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Le Place Restaurant, night. Jared is dining with a woman inside

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Christine, you know I love you very much, and I, I can't wait for the wedding.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I love you too, Jared. You've changed my whole life.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
role: Her name is Jonez, Christine Jonez

title: JARED HAS AIDES
role: She lost forty pounds when she met Jared, and-

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yeh, I know I know, I know. But uh... some young boys were talkin' to me earlier, and... it made me think that people might not be so proud of my weight loss if they knew something.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Jared, what's this all about?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Uh Christine, this isn't probably gonna matter to you at all, but... I have aides.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Uhwwwhat???

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yeah, I have aides. I've had aides since before we were together.  What, what are you thinking? Are you bummed?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Am I bummed?!  You've had AIDS all this time and you knew it?!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well of course I knew it.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Why the hell wouldn't you tell me?!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I didn't think it was that big of a deal.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Not that big of a deal?! I slept with you!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Aren't you overreacting a little bit?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well Jesus Christ! We're supposed to get married!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: We can still get married Christine, I mean, sure, they're my aides now, but after we get married... they'll be our aides  You'll love having aides, Christine, you really will. And when we have children, they'll have aides. It'll make things so simple!  Christine! Jeez, those boys were right. People really don't like aides. I'd better tell everyone the truth.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: South Park Elementary, next day. The boys enter the kitchen to get their meals.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hello there, children.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Chef, we need Butters to gain about fifty pounds fast.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Fifty pounds? Why?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Uuh, school project.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well, if you want him to get really fat as fast as possible, one of you will have to marry him.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Marry him?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: It definitely worked for every woman I ever met.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh no no no! I ain't gettin' married; my parents will ground me!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yeah, none of us wanna marry Butters.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well uh how come? What's wrong with me?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well, I guess we're gonna have to do this the old-fashioned way. Come on back, children.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: The kitchen, food preparation area. The camera pans across the table showing pots, pans, and dishes with food all over the place. It rests on Butters trying to finish off a plate, but struggling.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Ugh.  Wuh. Wuh I can't eat no more.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: You have to! Here, have some more mayonnaise.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Chef, we need more food.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I'm runnin' out, children.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Damnit Butters! Keep eating or I'll kick you till you're deader than Kenny!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Dude, that isn't cool. You shouldn't joke about Kenny being dead. Enough time hasn't passed.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: So how long until we can joke about it?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Twenty-two point three years. That's how long it takes for something tragic to become funny.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Woogh, that's a long time to wait.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wull I can't eat no more. I-I just keep pukin' it up.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Then eat your puke.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: NO!!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh come on! Japanese girls do it.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Kenny McCormick Memorial Town Square, later.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: He's going to speak with us once again!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: He's still lookin' good, eatin' them sandwiches all the time...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Thank you-hoo, thank you all. Subway's is a healthy way to eat fast food and lose weight!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: But,  I feel like I need to come a little clean about something, uh-... it wasn't ...just Subway sandwiches that made me thin.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: The reason I was able to lose so much weight so quickly was that I got aides.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Huh?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: What?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Did he say AIDS?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: But I still wanna be the leader in a fitter America, and so I'm here to tell you, that you should ALL go out and get aides!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh my God!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Is he serious?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Having aides - is - awesome! With aides you can literally watch the fat melt away! And with the proper mix of aides and Subway sandwiches, anything is possible!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Cartman's living room, some days later. Stan is measuring Butters' girth and grins at the result. Camera zooms out

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wow! He looks great!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: How do you feel, Butters?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: W-well, k-kinda like Cartman.  Ow!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Get a hold of yourself, man!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Alright, now it's time for phase 2.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: City Wok, moments later. The boys walk towards it and enter. The owner greets them

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wercome to Shitty Wok. You rike to try Shitty Chicken today?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Sir, we have come to offer you the business deal of a lifetime.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: You want the Shitty Beef?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Nope. We wanna show the world how healthy your food is. Our fat friend here is going to lose forty pounds eating at Shitty Wok.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Which one? I see two fat friends.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: The fat one!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: We're gonna take before and after photos, and then, when he gets skinny from eating your food, we'll show the world.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: ...Why?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Because then you can pay us to use our friend in commercials.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh! You mean like-a Jared!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Just like Jared.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: His name is Jared, he lose some weight. Shitty Wok food sure sells great. Yeah, okay. That sound good. Saw if he lose weight eating Shitty Wok, I pay use to use him in commercial.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: All right!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Sir, we are in business!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Subway company boardroom, day. Jared has been called in to see the board

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well, I appreciate your company doing everything it's done for me.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yes, well, it is now the opinion of all of us that perhaps it would be best for you to take your... strange theories on weight loss elsewhere.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: ...'Scuse me ...am I being fired?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Jared, it's just that your new take on weight loss is contrary to our commetment to good health.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: How so?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Ah hah.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: His name is Jared. Jared lost weight eating Subway and ... sandwiches of

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Flex Gym Fitness Club, day

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Come on, Butters, you gotta get skinny again!  You are such a flabby hunk of crap!! Look at those jelly rolls!! Jelly rolls I tell ya!! You still got seven chins, boah!! You'll never be thin!! Nobody loves you!!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wuh hey now, they do too! Uh, my mom and dad - love me even if I am fat.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Butters, I'm just trying to offer some motivational help here.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well alright then.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: ROW you fat bitch!! Look at those jelly rolls!! Nobody loves you!! You're not even a person!!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Jared's dressing room, day. Jared paces the room eating a sub sandwich

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I never asked to be famous; now everyone hates me! I almost wish I had never gotten aides!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hey now, come on. What kind of talk is that?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I'm sorry, guys, but I...I think I wanna be aides-free for a while.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Come on, Jared, lighten up! People don't hate you.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yeah. Maybe they're all just jealous that they can't afford to hire their own aides.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wait a minute... you're right!  Yeah! I think I know how to be a celebrity again!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: City Wok, outside, later. Cartman and Kyle wait on Stan as he arrives

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Did you bring the camera?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yeah, we're all set.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Guys, I think this might be a good time to discuss some business.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well what do you mean?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well, when City Wok sees how skinny Butters is, they're not gonna want him to just make one commercial, they're gonna want several.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That's true. Jared did like a hundred for Subway Sandwiches.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I think we're looking at a non-exclusive two-year fifty-picture deal here. My calculations put that at about four million dollars.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Wow.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Now, I think the four million should be split evenly among the three of us, except that I should get a twenty percent pernegation fee off the gross for having come up with the idea.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hey fellas.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Butters?? What the hell are you doing??

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yeah, you're still fat!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well, I know, ah I can't seem to lose it.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well we're supposed to shoot yoru commercial today, you fat piece of crap!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well ah I don't know what to tell ya. Losin' weight is harder than puttin' it on.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: No it isn't, stupid blubberbutt!!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Did you eat only once ounce of City Wok like we told you??

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well uhyeah, but ah, I don't know...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Why are you doing this to us?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Butters' house, later. The boys have prepared a makeshift operating table on the coffee table in the livingn room. Kyle reads from a medical book, Cartman has a suction tube and pail, and Stan is overseeing the operation

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: All prepared for liposuction surgery?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Check.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Uh, I don't know about this, fellas.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Hey, you're the one who screwed us by not losing weight, Butters.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Okay, it says here the operation begins with a one-inch incision in the ab-do-men on the left side just above the hip.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: That should blah  ah here.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Woahhh!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh stop your bitchin' Butters! Kenny woulda took it like a man!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Okay, now put one end of the tube a half an inch into the incision.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Alrighty.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Whoa. I think this is a bad idea, fellas. I feel woozy.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Alright, I think it's in.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: The liposuction is a process of siphoning out the excess fat.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Bohogh, egh.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Waaaahh.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: There it goes.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Alright, it's working!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Aw man, it tastes like that, um, you know that cream-chipped-beef stuff that Chef makes sometimes.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Aahh heh ahh, I don't feel very good.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Shut up, Butters, it's your own damned fault.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Everything's getting dark...

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: We've gotta hurry this up.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh yeah, keep doing that. That's working good.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: He's losing weight.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh, whoa. Whoa!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: It's out of control!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Whoa, everything's getting sparkly.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh no, dude, Butters' parents are home.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh, crap!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Dude, bail!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Butters? BUTTERS??

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Mom. Dad.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Butters. Are you having liposuction surgery? Tell me the truth!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yes sir.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: This is unbelievable! How many times have we told you not to have self-performed liposuction surgery in our house?!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Four times, mom.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Well, I guess that wasn't enough! You get up to your room right now, mister!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yes, sir.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Oh huh don't you give us that look young man! You're gonna get it!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: News 4 News, day. A field reporter stands in front of the Mayor's office. The mayor and her aides are present

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Tom, I'm standing out in front of the Mayor's office, where the big liar, Jared, is once again about to speak. Apparently, Jared hopes to regain his celebrity hero status, which was lost when he announced that it was AIDS, not sub sandwiches, that caused him to lose weight. Let's listen in.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: The podium. Jared stands behind it

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Ladies and gentlemen, a- at first I didn't understand why you felt betrayed by the fact that my aides helped me to lose weight, but now I understand that it isn't fair that- I had aides and most of you don't. And so, with all the money I've made from commercials, I have decided to start the Aides for Everyone Foundation!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: What??

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I am going to personally see to it that each and every one of you gets aides!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: This guys' insane.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: But I won't stup there. I'm gonna seek out all the underprivileged and hungry children of the world, and I'm giong to give them aides myself!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: You're gonna give children AIDS?!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Yes, it is my hope that every beautiful child on this earth has aides by next month! Aides for everyone!!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Get him!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Butters' house, some days later. Stan, Kyle, and Cartman show up at the front door, and Cartman rings the bell

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Come on, Butters. Time to go.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: Uh go where?

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: To City Wok so we can make our money. God!

title: JARED HAS AIDES
text: I can't go anywhere, fellas. I've been grounded for havin' lipo-suction... surgery.

title: JARED HAS AIDES
